headline.main: WAR AUGMENTS NEEDS OF CATHOLIC MISSIONS; Annual Appeal Made in World Broadcast From Rome

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 18 -- Catholic Church missions had stronger reason than ever for support, said Mgr. Celso Costantini, Titular Archbishop of Teodosia, in the annual appeal made today over a world-wide broadcast on behalf of Missionary Day.
abstract: Mgr A Bartolomasi says Brit, U S and USSR are real enemies of Italy

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
